text: Brücke zwischen gestern und morgen (English: Bridge Between Yesterday and Tomorrow) is an East German television film directed by Fred Mahr. It was released in 1959. ==Cast== * Antje Ruge as Frau Wermann * Rudolf Ulrich as Hans Gutweil * Ellinor Vogel as Herta Gutweil * Hans Knötzsch as Flüchting * Peter A. Stiege as Willi Rückert ==External links== * Category:1959 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:German black-and-white films
title: Brücke zwischen gestern und morgen
